data.expected_result: Search result would just span out longer vertically.
data.short_description: Search result runs off screen with long one words in embeds
data.steps_to_repro: - Paste <https://github.com/SpongePowered/SpongeCommon/issues/1574> by itself in a message and send it.- Search for the link.- Notice the title wraps off the side of the search results screen.
